sections.pali: ‘‘Uccamidaṃ maṇithūṇaṃ vimānaṃ, samantato dvādasa yojanāni; Kūṭāgārā sattasatā uḷārā, veḷuriyathambhā rucakatthatā subhā.
‘‘Deviddhipattosi mahānubhāvo, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ; Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Ahaṃ manussesu manussabhūto, disvāna bhikkhuṃ tasitaṃ kilantaṃ; Ekāhaṃ bhikkhaṃ paṭipādayissaṃ, samaṅgi bhattena tadā akāsiṃ.
‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti. Bhikkhādāyakavimānaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ.
